body:
I want to say a big thank you to Rob for editing and posting the videos so
quickly.

You'll also noticed that i've posted a zip file containing all
presentations for connivence and a zip file of Greg's workshop photos on
the workshop website.

Also, an album of Greg's photos has been uploaded to Radiance's facebook
website so go tag yourself and your friends:
www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.292933804179749.1073741829.292150784258051&type=3

Best,
Andy



On Wed, Aug 21, 2013 at 1:25 PM, Guglielmetti, Robert <
Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov> wrote:
